release_notes.en-US:
Version 63.9.

Color of unifinder search box in Calendar was changed to frame color.
Color of task addition box in Tasks was changed to frame color.

March 23rd 2021.

From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: I thank core developers who have developed and elaborated theme APIs. Enjoy FrameWhite, FrameBlack and BlueWhite, GreenWhite, RedWhite and LightBlue, LightGreen, LightYellow, LightRed and BlueYellow, GreenYellow, RedYellow themes. In Red-Green-Blue(RGB) colors, light colors with black text colors are more pretty than very deep colors with white text colors. So, I have understood that Light theme was different to Dark theme and differences were not bugs in theme APIs. In short, I have understood that deep RGB colors in background except black or white theme are not such pretty. Version 63.9 in 2021-03-23. Color of unifinder search box in Calendar was changed to frame color. Color of task addition box in Tasks was changed to frame color. Dark theme mode should be used in FrameBlack. Light theme mode should be used in FrameWhite. Version 63.9 was blended with Experiment API to change colors of the above boxes. I have suggested and requested to contain colors of the above boxes in frame color. If this request would be accepted, I will remove Experiment API in the next version. Please, hold on version 63.9 so that you would like & love this FrameWhite version. And, I am not a supported developer. Would you contribute some to me for continuous developments. I have happy dreams by one dollar and fifty cents. March 23rd 2021. [Next improvements] Would you recommend improvements for details of themes? Thank you, 3rdRockGuy. Thank you, lordiron. March 23rd 2020. From Sungho Hwang.
description.ko: I thank core developers who have developed and elaborated theme APIs. Enjoy FrameWhite, FrameBlack and BlueWhite, GreenWhite, RedWhite and LightBlue, LightGreen, LightYellow, LightRed and BlueYellow, GreenYellow, RedYellow themes. In Red-Green-Blue(RGB) colors, light colors with black text colors are more pretty than very deep colors with white text colors. So, I have understood that Light theme was different to Dark theme and differences were not bugs in theme APIs. In short, I have understood that deep RGB colors in background except black or white theme are not such pretty. Version 63.9 in 2021-03-23. Color of unifinder search box in Calendar was changed to frame color. Color of task addition box in Tasks was changed to frame color. Version 63.9 runs in Light theme. Version 63.9 is not compatible with Dark theme. Instead, please, use FrameBlack of FrameWhite options. Version 63.9 was blended with Experiment API to change colors of the above boxes. I have suggested and requested to contain colors of the above boxes in frame color. If this request would be accepted, I will remove Experiment API in the next version. Please, hold on version 63.9 so that you would like & love this FrameWhite version. And, I am not a supported developer. Would you contribute some to me for continuous developments. I have happy dreams by one dollar and fifty cents. March 23rd 2021. [Next improvements] Would you recommend improvements for details of themes? Thank you, 3rdRockGuy. Thank you, lordiron. March 23rd 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

summary.en-US:
Version 63.9 has been released.
Dark theme mode should be used in FrameBlack.
Light theme mode should be used in FrameWhite.

I thank core developers who have developed and elaborated theme APIs.

send a gift to a friend Eunjo.
summary.ko:
버전 63.9가 2021년 3월 23일자로 출시되었습니다.
다크 테마를 사용하려면, 프레임블랙에서 전환하세요.
라이트 테마를 사용하려면, 프레임화이트에서 전환하세요.
theme API를 개발하고 다듬은 핵심 개발자들에게 감사를 드립니다.

친구 은조에게 선물로 보내며.

2021년 3월 23일.

개발자 황성호.
